unparsed_output: he Coca-Cola Company is committed to being transparent about the nutritional content of their products. They are committed to responsible marketing of their products, honoring the rights of parents and caregivers, and informing and educating consumers about the beverages they provide. They are also committed to promoting active and healthy lifestyles, part of the workable solutions to the problems facing society related to obesity by assisting their associates and their families, as well as the communities that they serve.
